item.title: Uttarakhand Qualify for Maiden Semi-Final; Gharami's Double-Ton Deflates Andhra
item.description: Uttarakhand's historic journey continues as Gharami's double-century leads them to their first semi-final, defeating Andhra in a thrilling encounter.
